item.title: Is the Indian stock market open or closed on Monday after the declaration of a public holiday in Mumbai?

review.headline_rewrite: Is the Indian stock market open or closed on Monday after the declaration of a public holiday in Mumbai?
bullets: To avoid confusion, investors and stock market observers are advised to look at the stock market holidays 2025 list on the official BSE website
This means NSE and BSE will remain open on Monday.
In other words, trading activities at the NSE and the BSE will resume as usual after the regular weekend holidays.

item.title: Ola Electric’s financial controls under scrutiny as auditor flags material weakness in inventory controls

review.headline_rewrite: Ola Electric’s financial controls under scrutiny as auditor flags material weakness in inventory controls
bullets: In a latest development, one of Ola’s early backers SoftBank offloaded a 2.15 per cent stake in the company through open market transactions.
The company reported a consolidated net loss of ₹428 crore in Q1FY26.
Revenue for the quarter dipped to ₹828 crore, down by 49.6 per cent year-on-year (YoY) from ₹1,644 crore.
